channel.title: Spawning and turning into npcs (please help!)
channel.description:
can somone give me a code on how to get all level admins ( lvl 1, lvl 2, and lvl 3) to be able to spawn any amount of items, and to be able to turn into npcs
please i dont know what lvl 2 admins can even do!

item.title: Spawning and turning into npcs (please help!)
item.dc:creator: @dragx55 dragx55
item.description:
@dragx55 wrote:

1.Go in to characters file and find your character.
2.Find this.character-rights =
3.Change Character rights to 3 if 0.

Read full topic
item.source: Spawning and turning into npcs (please help!)
